page.title: 04UPPER FARM LODGE FARM
page.content: {UPPER FARM}IS IN{N.W.CHIPPENHAM MR STAINER IS AN{ARABLE AND BEEF FARMER . HE HAS 65{FRESIAN}COWS . HE GROWS{WINTER BARLEY AND POTATOES THE FARM IS{200 YEARS}OLD . MR STAINER SENDS HIS ANIMALS TO MARKET IN CHIPPENHAM . MR STAINER HAS BEEN A FARMER ALL HIS LIFE HE HAS 2 FARM HANDS . UPPER FARM GOT ITS NAME BECAUSE IT IS ON A HILL {LODGE FARM}IS 2 KM N FROM CHIPPENHAM. THE FARMER'S NAME IS MR COLLINS AND HE IS AN{ARABLE AND STOCK FARMER. HE HAS 101{BEEF}CATTLE AND FOR CROPS HE GROWS{OATS,BARLEY AND WHEAT .}THE FARM IS 140 ACRES AND HAS BEEN THERE 400 YEARS . MR COLLINS SENDS HIS ANIMALS TO MARKET IN FAREHAM.HE WORKS 8 HOURS A DAY IN WINTER AND 12 HOURS IN SUMMER.HE HAS BEEN A FARMER FOR SIX YEARS AND HE HAS GOT ONE FARMHAND.
